options.text: A frequency polygon is obtained by connecting the corner points of the rectangles in a histogram.
options.equation_data: A frequency polygon is obtained by connecting the corner points of the rectangles in a histogram.

options.text: A frequency polygon is obtained by connecting the mid-points of the tops of the rectangles in a histogram.
options.equation_data: A frequency polygon is obtained by connecting the mid-points of the tops of the rectangles in a histogram.

options.text: A frequency polygon is obtained by connecting the corner points of the class intervals in a histogram.

solution.explanation: Correct Answer is : A frequency polygon is obtained by connecting the mid-points of the tops of the rectangles in a histogram.
